products.title: Bella Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Black Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £9.60 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, our Bella Blackout Black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first. Our roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2043 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Black Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Black Panel Blind in Black. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, our Bella Blackout Black panel blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money.  Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our panel blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our panel blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

products.title: Bella Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind. Made to measure from £138.17 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, our Bella Blackout Black electric roller blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout electric roller blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Due to their chain-free control options our electric roller blinds are Inherently child-safe by design, and if you upgrade with the Smart Home Hub, our electric roller blinds become controllable with your mobile phone. 
 
At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
